Government
==========

The City of Anahuac is a type A, General Law City.
--------------------------------------------------

The governing body, known as the City Council, consists of a mayor and five (5) Council Members. City Council positions are for two-year terms, City Election for positions on the City Council are held in May of each year.

##### Tax Information

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.
